Title: A Space Oddity
Plot: When the producer of the reboot of a classic SF show is murdered at a Las Vegas science-fiction convention attended by both Hodges and Wendy (both, unknown to each other, fans of the original show), they find a connection with each other as the team investigates the crime.
GuestStars: Liz Vassey, David Berman, Reg Rogers, Jaime Ray Newman, Kate Vernon, Liza Weil, Michael Welch, Patrick Bristow, Joshua Cox, Bradford Tatum, Archie Kao, Sheeri Rappaport, Jon Wellner, Karl Herlinger, Randy Lowell, M
